doc:
Susan Blakely https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Susan_Blakely 0 Susan Blakely (born September 7, 1948) is an American actress and model. She is best known for her leading role in the 1976 ABC miniseries, Rich Man, Poor Man, for which she received a Golden Globe Award for Best Actress – Television Series Drama. Blakely also has appeared in films including The Towering Inferno (1974), Report to the Commissioner (1975), Capone (1975), The Concorde ... Airport '79 (1979), and Over the Top (1987). Susan_Blakely ( born September_7_,_1948 ) is an_American_actress_and_model .
